food.title: Aikawa Tuna (8 pcs)
food.description: White tuna sashimi garnished with fresh mango and grilled garlic.

food.title: Atlantis (8 pcs)
food.description: Crabstick, asparagus, fried carrot, tempura, tobiko, and avocado rolled in a soya bean leaf, topped with smoked-salmon.

food.title: Empress (8 pcs)
food.description: Fresh salmon and tuna sashimi rolled in tofu leaf, topped with tobiko and mango.

food.title: Salmon Sensation (8 pcs)
food.description: Spicy salmon, avocado, lettuce, shiso leaf, tobiko.

food.title: Jade (8 pcs)
food.description: Fresh salmon and tuna sashimi rolled in seaweed slightly breaded with tempura, topped with tobiko

food.title: Jumbo Ébi (8 pcs)AC
food.description: Katsu jumbo shrimps served with chef’s spicy sauce and tobiko.

food.title: Spicy Sunshine (4 pcs)
food.description: A tasty seasoned tartar of fresh scallops and crab, served on 4 sweet potato chips.

food.title: Mango Tango* (8 pcs)
food.description: Tempura shrimp, raw scallop, tobiko, and mango strips rolled in soya bean leaf.

food.title: Secret Garden* (8 pcs)
food.description: Soya bean leaf roll with spicy salmon, cream cheese, avocado, tobiko, crab meat, and shrimp chips wrapped in a banana leaf.

food.title: Sweet Temptation* (8 pcs)
food.description: Crabstick, katsu scallop, tobiko, avocado, and cucumber.
